title: Admission query
content: So, I have secured a PESSAT rank of 783...but I've been informed that the fees for CET admissions are WAAAAY lower...so I just wanted to know if we can surrender our seats via PESSAT if we get seats through CET

comments.body: I am PESSAT 2022 candidate. Once you take the seat, you'll have to pay the admission fees in PESSAT counselling. After that as far as I know , unless you get seat in IIT/NIT , they won't refund the fees paid. !
I think it was possible before as I know a couple of people who first got in through PESSAT and later changed to CET. You might still wanna confirm it with the college though.

Assuming you mean CET admission in PES itself, yes you can.  
For other colleges we had a deadline to surrender seat by that date.
yes you can surrender the seats but dont expect 100% refund from pesu... expect like 80-90% refund
Yes, I did mean within PESU itself...thanks a lot:D
You can get admission through PESSAT, and then convert your seat to a KCET Quota seat later on. A lot of people did that among your direct seniors
